title.narrative: 8.4.1 Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) /SITUATIONS HUMANITAIRES

description.narrative: In humanitarian emergencies, people access a basic Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) package based on the CCC standards., which contributes to Sanitation, Wash And Emergencies, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Women and children have access to drinking water, to improved sanitation, and they adopt good hygiene practices.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: In humanitarian emergencies, people access a basic WASH package based on the CCC standards.

description.narrative: Since 2014, UNICEF CDI has supported more than 350.000 vulnerable population included 272.000 pupils before and during humanitarian crisis (Cholera prevention and response, Ebola prevention , IDPs) and ensure the co-lead (with Government) of WASH group or WASH cluster during those crisis | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2017

title.narrative: Number of people at high risk of cholera who have access to information about transmission, prevention and treatment of cholera

actual.value: 2015:31,500 people lived in poor areas with high-risk of cholera in Abidjan, were provided with hygiene kits (hand washing devices, soaps, chlorine, posters) and were informed and sensitized on preventive measures.

title.narrative: UNICEF-targeted population in humanitarian situations accessing sufficient quantity of water of appropriate quality for drinking, cooking and personal hygiene

actual.value: 2017:All the 33.000 IDPs and hosted populations from Bouna and Mont Peko received a completed WASH package

title.narrative: WASH cluster coordination is put in place in response to humanitarian emergencies

target.value: 2015:A WASH cluster coordination set up in case of emergency situation

actual.value: 2015:No emergency situation that needed to put in place a WASH cluster mecanism
